name: Dig Deep Get Gold
description:
This is a rhythm/timing game where you try to collect as much gold as possible within 1 minute.

You choose left or right at each branch to decide which way to go. If you time your choice just right, you get a speed boost.

This is my first game jam entry (Ludum Dare 48 Compo). The theme of the jam is "deeper and deeper".

Total development time was about 16 hours.

Source code: https://github.com/timcode77/ld48

Ludum Dare 48 submission: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/dig-deep-get-gold

I used:

  • Godot Game Engine 3.3
  • Krita 4.4.2
  • Reaper DAW 6.2
